ValidationRule.description: Inactivation Date cannot have a value if Contact Status is Active
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( Contact_Status__c , "Active"), not( $Profile.Name = 'PeopleSoft API User' ), not( $Profile.Name = 'Honeywell System Administrator (Non US)' ), NOT( ISNULL( Employee_Inactivated_Date__c ) ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Employee Inactivated Date cannot have a value if Contact Status is Active
